remarks: Subtraction of a group element from itself.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Dec-2014.)
statement:
mulgsubdir.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
mulgsubdir.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
mulgsubdir.d $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
mulgsubdir $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ /\ X e. B ) ) -> ( ( M - N ) .x. X ) = ( ( M .x. X ) .- ( N .x. X ) ) ) $.
